author: Marc Brunet
description:
I got the art for this here https://imgur.com/a/curse-of-monkey-island-esrgan-dither-removal-upscaling-complete-set-Plfj7Uo, from one of my all time favorite games. Just painted over some bits but all the credits to the original artist Bill Tiller. Original images were 680px so this was upscaled  (badly) by whoever posted this on imgur.
